title: Underfitting, overfitting and model complexity
snippet: In this post I will talk about the underfitting and overfitting phenomena, and how model complexity affects them. I will also explain the bias-variance trade-off.We will demonstrate these concepts with a binary classification example, where we will try to predict whether a forest elf will survive...
